name: 克里斯蒂·贝克特
name_full: 克里斯蒂·贝克特 Kristi Beckett

last_movies.title: 机器少女法兰姬 第二季
机器少女法兰姬 第一季

introduction: Kristi Beckett is known for Nickelodeon's "I Am Frankie". She is a television and stage actress, vocalist, and dancer, performing since age 3. Her first professional role was Little Cosette in Les Miserables. She continued performing on stage in exciting, challenging roles such as Karen in War Letters, Genie in Aladdin and Kendra in 13 The Musical. Kristi appeared in a promotional interview on TV and was hooked. After several commercials and voice-overs the local television station offered her a host position, interviewing local entertainers. Kristi was born and raised in sunny Florida.
